title: Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton
Techniqiue: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 37 x 70.5 cm (14 9/16 x 27 3/4 in.)
Repeat H x W: 33 x 23.5 cm (13 in. x 9 1/4 in.)
description: Fragment with a country scene of a windmill, a woman on a road and a house under a flowering tree. Pattern in red and black on a white ground with red picotage. Half-drop repeat.
